title: Does Eddie Van Halen have cancer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do yourself a favor and stick a red hot fire poker up your arse you piece of shit! This is obviously a troll question! Eddie Van Halen died of Throat Cancer on the 6th of October this month and you will not disrespect him further you slimy bag of pus! Now go back to hell where you belong!
“Doctors discovered his lung cancer had moved to his brain as well as other organs.”(1) Links:- (1) Eddie Van Halen Dead at 65 from Cancer (2) Eddie Van Halen - Wikipedia
